question.questionDesc: What is the name of the song that Queen Elsa sings as she builds her ice castle in the movie Frozen?
How many films did Sean Connery play James Bond in?
In the "Friends" theme song, what are you always stuck in?
How many Lord of the Rings films are there?
Which popular TV show featured house Targaryen and Stark?
In The Matrix, does Neo take the blue pill or the red pill?
Which cartoon character lives in a pineapple under the sea?
question.clue: First letter of the name is "S"

question.questionDesc: In what year was the first episode of South Park aired?
Who played Wolverine?
question.clue: First letter of the actor is "H"

question.questionDesc: By which collective name would you identify the group whose firs names begin with J. P. G. and R?
question.clue: English rock band formed in Liverpool in 1960

question.questionDesc: How many cards are there in a deck of Uno?
In which board game do you try to solve a murder?
question.clue: First letter of the name is "C"

question.questionDesc: In chess, the queen has the combined movement of which two pieces?
Which of these games includes the phrase “Do not pass go, do not collect $200”?
question.clue: First letter of the game is "M"

question.questionDesc: The video game “Happy Feet” features what animals?
What classic video game requires you to eat all the dots throughout a maze?
Which Street Fighter character wears a white outfit and a red headband?
question.clue: The number of letter is three.

question.questionDesc: What sport is featured in the video game “FIFA”?
question.clue: First letter of the name is "F"
